entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Old Crow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Old Crow Airport 7:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -34.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -37.9°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
